attributes.action: Build new railway lines and stations as recommended in the recent ATOC report.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A recent report from the Association of Train Operating Companies (ATOC) recommended opening 14 new railway lines and about 40 new stations. This would improve transportation in our crowded islands.
It would have the additional benefits of potentially reducing carbon emissions by reducing car use and boosting the economy through new construction jobs.
